entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
